document_data.name: Fala Lefaliir
document_data.mainbody: '''Fala Lefaliir''' ({{Pronounce|FAH|lah|_|LEF|ah|leer|refs=}}) was a [[wood elf]] herbalist in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Fala had an outgoing personality. Like Fala's patron [[deity]] [[Corellon Larethian]], Fala was neither male nor female and requested to be referred to by name or by the pronoun "they".
document_data.Activities: Fala was an herbalist and potion seller in [[Trollskull Alley]] in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] and a member of the [[Guild of Apothecaries and Physicians]]. Fala's shop was known as [[Corellon's Crown]], a three-story building on Trollskull Alley whose third floor had been converted into a greenhouse with glass walls that allowed passers-by to see a variety of multicolored flowers inside.
document_data.Relationships: Fala was a friend of the [[Zhentarim]] agent [[Ziraj]], who once saved Fala's life. Fala kept a room open on the second floor of the shop for Ziraj and his occasional visits.
document_data.History: Fala was an eyewitness to the detonation of the ''[[fireball]]'' on Trollskull Alley in {{Yearlink|1492}}.{{Waterdeep-time}} The blast broke some of the greenhouse's windows, but no one in the building was injured.
